explains: adj. 青翠的；翠绿的；没有经验的；不老练的

sentences.en: Along the way, we despoiled most of the land we worked, often turning verdant, natural ecozones into semi-arid deserts.
sentences.cn: 一路上，我们破坏了大多数我们曾经耕作过的的土地，经常把翠绿的自然生态区变成了半干旱的沙漠。

sentences.en: There is a verdant lawn in front of the dormitory.
sentences.cn: 宿舍前是绿茵茵的草坪。

sentences.en: On all sides, verdant sunset-bathed hills greet the eye.
